entries.name: getApplet(String name)
entries.desc:
Finds and returns the applet in the document represented by this
applet context with the given name.

entries.name: getApplets()
entries.desc:
Finds all the applets in the document represented by this applet
context.

entries.name: getImage(URL url)
entries.desc:
Returns an Image object that can then be painted on
the screen.

entries.name: getStream(String key)
entries.desc:
Returns the stream to which specified key is associated within this
applet context.

entries.name: getStreamKeys()
entries.desc: Finds all the keys of the streams in this applet context.

entries.name:
setStream(String key,
InputStream stream)
entries.desc:
Associates the specified stream with the specified key in this
applet context.

entries.name: showDocument(URL url)
entries.desc:
Requests that the browser or applet viewer show the Web page
indicated by the url argument.

entries.name:
showDocument(URL url,
String target)
entries.desc:
Requests that the browser or applet viewer show the Web page
indicated by the url argument.

entries.name: showStatus(String status)
entries.desc:
Requests that the argument string be displayed in the
"status window".

desc:
This interface corresponds to an applet's environment: the
document containing the applet and the other applets in the same
document.
The methods in this interface can be used by an applet to obtain
information about its environment.
